name: solana-blockchain-explorer
title: Solana Blockchain Explorer
description: Brings the Solana Explorer to your Raycast. Quickly Search by Address, Transaction Hash, block or token.
author: dharmin_nagar

commands.name: search-explorer
commands.title: Search Explorer
commands.description: Quickly open up a Search Menu for the Explorer

preferences.name: mainnetRpcUrl
preferences.title: Mainnet RPC URL
preferences.description: Enter your preferred Mainnet RPC URL

preferences.name: devnetRpcUrl
preferences.title: Devnet RPC URL
preferences.description: Enter your preferred Devnet RPC URL

preferences.name: testnetRpcUrl
preferences.title: Testnet RPC URL
preferences.description: Enter your preferred Testnet RPC URL

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
